title: New: Lovelier Other – Hidden Shelters
content:
With their mysterious, enchanting imagery and current anonymity (although being the internet detective that I am, it didn’t take me too long to find out their identities), Lovelier Other clocked up an impressive 12,000 plays of their debut track, Leave This Behind, which surfaced toward the tail end of last year.

New cut Hidden Shelters picks up where their debut left off, with floaty-ethereal pop, almost too slick and sonically perfect for words, from the smooth vocals to the soaring string sections. Check it out underneath.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
